mapper.update:
update gooutsystem
goOutTime = #{goouttime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goOutAbsenteeism = #{gooutabsenteeism,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TimeNo = #{timeno,jdbcType=BIT},
systemId = #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where goOutSystemId = #{gooutsystemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from gooutsystem where goOutTime = #{goouttime,jdbcType=INTEGER} and goOutAbsenteeism = #{gooutabsenteeism,jdbcType=INTEGER} and TimeNo = #{timeno,jdbcType=BIT} and systemId = #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and deleteNo=0;

mapper.delete: update gooutsystem set deleteNo=1 where systemId= #{systemid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
